name: Landsknecht Shirt, Black and White
description: This Landsknecht shirt is ideal for Renaissance Fairs and LARP events. Its two-toned paned sleeves, laced front, heavy cotton confection give this shirt a medieval flavor.

name: Aramis Shirt, Dark Red
description: The Red Aramis long-sleeve shirt is a superb larp shirt which has fringes along the cuffs as well as collar . This long sleeve pirate top was meant for larping and can complement almost any traditional garb . This comfy natural cotton shirt includes billowed sleeves that attach with a string as well as a buttoned winged collar .

name: Aramis Shirt, White
description: The White Aramis shirt is a great period shirt that has fringes along the cuffs and collar. This long sleeve pirate shirt was intended for larping but will match just about any authentic costume. This comfortable cotton shirt has billowed sleeves that tie with a string and also comes with a buttoned winged collar.

name: Odin Shirt, Dark Brown
description: This Scandinavian inspired cotton shirt has a simple v-neck collar and elbow length sleeves. This unisex cotton shirt has a versatile look that can easily fit with most any costume.  Ideal for the hot summer months this casual medieval shirt is soon to be a classic.

name: Odin Shirt, White
description: This Scandinavian inspired cotton shirt has a simple v-neck collar and elbow length sleeves. This unisex cotton shirt has a versatile look that can easily fit with most any costume.  Ideal for the hot summer months this casual medieval shirt is soon to be a classic.

name: Godfrey Shirt, White
description: The Godfrey long sleeved shirt is a timeless piece of costume clothing and will match with many other period outfits. This Unisex medieval shirt has a collarless winged v-neck with billowed sleeves and laced cuffs.  It offers a comfy relaxed fit and is perfect for any renaissance festival.

name: Godfrey Shirt, Black
description: The Godfrey long sleeved shirt is a timeless piece of costume clothing and will match with many other period outfits. This Unisex medieval shirt has a collarless winged v-neck with billowed sleeves and laced cuffs.  It offers a comfy relaxed fit and is perfect for any renaissance festival.

name: Fencing Shirt, Black
description: The fencing shirt is a timeless renaissance shirt perfect for fairs, LARP and Cosplay. this cotton shirt features tied cuffs, laced collar and ample full length sleeves.

name: Fencing Shirt, White
description: The white fencing shirt is a timeless medieval shirt and is a must have at any larp. This hip length shirt with collar can be laced up in the front and is made with good quality thin cotton.  The shirt was designed as loose fitted and will fit any period in any universe and has full length sleeves with a tie at the cuff.

name: Landsknecht Shirt, Black and Red
description: This Landsknecht shirt is ideal for Renaissance Fairs and LARP events. Its two-toned paned sleeves, laced front, heavy cotton confection give this shirt a medieval flavor.

name: Aramis Shirt, Black
description: The Black Aramis Larp shirt is a great period shirt that has a renaissance pirate look and charm. This long sleeve pirate shirt has fringes along the cuffs and collar and will match just about any period costume. This comfortable cotton shirt has billowed sleeves that tie with a string and comes with a buttoned winged collar.
